DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating 13-Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine ( 13vPnC ) In Healthy Infants In China
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 42 77 day ( approximately 2 month ) time enrollment . 2 . Healthy infant determine medical history , physical examination , judgment investigator . 1 .
